caption.body: Universal released the Creature from the Black Lagoon in 1954, and quickly followed it up with two sequels. It was the first film to feature underwater scenes in 3-D. The underwater scenes were filmed in Wakulla Springs, Florida. Ex-Marine Ben Chapman played the Gill Man above water while Florida State student Ricou Browning performed the underwater scenes. This prop from the Revenge of the Creature, the sequel to the Creature from the Black Lagoon, is featured in our Classic Monsters exhibition in Terminal Two. Classic Monsters is on display until December 2015. #classicmonsters #kirksmonsters #kirkhammett #monstermonday  Revenge of the Creature prop head c.1955 Makeup artist/design: Bud Westmore (1918-73)/Millicent Patrick (1915-98) Universal Pictures Universal City  L2014.3901.004
caption.excerpt: Universal released the Creature from the Black Lagoon in 1954, and quickly followed it up with two sequels.
